class.name: vel_fwd_pva_fwd_controllers/JoggingCommandController
class.description: The JoggingCommandController allows individual joints to be jogged at specified velocities, following a trapezoidal trajectory. This variant uses both a velocity forwarding and position-velocity-acceleration forwarding control interface.

class.name: vel_fwd_pva_fwd_controllers/JointTrajectoryController
class.description: The JointTrajectoryController executes joint-space trajectories on a set of joints. This variant represents trajectory segments as quintic splines. This variant uses both a velocity forwarding and position-velocity-acceleration forwarding control interface.
